n: Jbird's Authentic Sweet Vinegar BBQ Sauce
des: "This is pure eastern North Carolina BBQ Sauce at its best.  Primarily used for saucing up that perfect pig at the family and friends pig pickin', this recipe can be used for other bbq favorites.  With a twist of honey, this sauce is awesome on bbq chicken and pork chops as well.  Enjoy!!"
ins: In a saucepan, stir together the vinegar, red pepper flakes, pepper and salt. Bring to a boil. Stir in the ketchup and honey; reduce heat to low, and simmer for 30 minutes.
